backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, multiple ordered maps for ponds, posts, ribbits, users, tags, likes, activities, and related types like Pond, Post, Ribbit, and Activity.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing structure and functionality of many frontend files and pages.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide explaining prerequisites and steps for building and deploying the app on the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the frontend root and main TypeScript module.
frontend/scripts/combined-update.sh: Automated script that generates backend bindings, builds the frontend, and deploys canisters with error handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, theming, and ensuring Froggy Phrase setup on mount.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks to manage bookmark state.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a single comment with avatar, timestamp, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Emoji reaction bar supporting multiple emoji types, hover effects, counts, and selection state.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with navigation links and copyright notice referencing caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the responsive top navigation bar with search, avatar, and mobile/desktop behaviors. Manages search dropdowns, mobile modals, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout containing header, footer, and routed content. Manages opening and closing of the mobile left sidebar drawer on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Renders the navigation sidebar with links and recent activity. Highlights active routes and supports both desktop and mobile drawer modes.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post preview with user info, pond badge, counts, like/share actions, and an optional image. Fetches post-related metadata such as likes, views, and avatars.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders an image in a 4:3 frame with automatic aspect-ratio detection. Uses a blurred backdrop for non-4:3 images to maintain consistent layout.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Provides a sliding mobile sidebar drawer with a scrim overlay. Locks body scrolling when open and embeds the LeftSidebar component.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows detailed pond information including description, stats, moderators, and join/leave controls. Fetches pond metadata and handles join/leave mutations with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: A small control allowing users to join a pond from a card. Handles join requests, prevents navigation on click, and shows mutation status.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header showing a pond’s banner, profile info, and tab navigation with routing.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with votes, metadata, preview content, image, tag, and engagement stats.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user’s ribbit with avatar, linked post title, timestamp, and a link to the conversation.
Popover tray providing quick emoji reactions via a selectable emoji list.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Shows a threaded ribbit with avatar, likes, reply form, and indentation based on depth.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Handles mini blurred avatar placeholders with smooth transition to a loaded image.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Sidebar listing trending ponds, popular tags, and popular recent posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full‑screen mobile search modal showing trending searches or suggestions and handles query input and selection.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown under a search bar displaying trending searches or suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar displaying top, trending, and newest tags using reusable tag stats modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides wrapper components around TabsList and TabsTrigger with underline-specific class styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions for adding, removing, and toggling bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a media query matches and updates the value on window size changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend interactions such as retrieving ponds, joining/leaving ponds, and creating ponds.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables for light/dark modes, and custom utility classes for UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into compact strings like 1.2k or 1.5M.
frontend/src/lib/froggyPhraseWordList.ts: Exports frog-related terms and a large word list used for generating Froggy Phrases.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image validation, resizing, format conversion, and compression utilities.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric format and returns user-friendly errors.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lily count, member count, and name, returning a map of pond names to ranks.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL using Web Share API with clipboard fallback and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and provides error messages for invalid input.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages username, user ID, and Froggy Phrase generation/storage using localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per-lily view cooldown tracking using localStorage timestamps.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page describing the Ribbit platform, its features, and community guidelines using static text and styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays a list of all ponds with loading states, ranking, join controls, and navigation to create or view individual ponds.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form for creating lilies with support for text, images, links, tags, pond selection, image compression, and tag suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with name validation, description fields, and image upload/compression for banner and profile images.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Offers a post creation interface supporting text, image, or link posts with pond selection, tag input, and optional image compression.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Renders a user profile page with avatar, stats, tabs for posts and comments, and handles loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main feed with trending/new sorting, search results, sidebars, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Shows a single lily post with comments, likes, views, image lightbox, and handles ribbit creation and view count logic.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Displays detailed information about a pond, including moderators, visibility, join/leave actions, and loading/not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond's feed with sorted lilies, sidebars, mobile header, and not-found or loading fallbacks.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a single post with content, media, comments, sorting, and a form to submit new ribbit comments.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Shows the user's locally saved lilies and lets them remove bookmarks, loading each lily via its ID.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Lists top, trending, and newest tags with stats, using tabs and sidebars for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Shows lilies for a given tag with sorting, canonical tag redirection, and related subcategories.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides username management, avatar upload, profile editing, pond membership controls, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, radii, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Defines overall project state including schema version, existing features, and pending feature requests for settings layout and avatar handling. Contains metadata like project name, issue lists, and configuration flags.
